name: Valley Residential Services, Inc.
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Valley Residential Services, Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Saint Charles, MI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $45.2M in Medicaid payments across 102K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $45.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
